sections.heading: right; waiver or limitation; unenforceable
sections.text: Any provision of a contract or agreement that waives or limits in any way a consumer right described in sections 87-1107 to 87-1109 is contrary to public policy and is void and unenforceable.SourceLaws 2024, LB1074, ยง 10.

87-1110.Consumer right; waiver or limitation; unenforceable.

Any provision of a contract or agreement that waives or limits in any way a consumer right described in sections 87-1107 to 87-1109 is contrary to public policy and is void and unenforceable.

SourceLaws 2024, LB1074, ยง 10.
